## MongoDBConnector class

MongoDB connector. Create a new MongoDB connection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class MongoDBConnector 
```

## Example


```
new MongoDBConnector(
   'mongodb://mongodb:27017/',
   'subito',
   {
     authSource: 'admin',
     replicaSet: 'rs0',
   }
);
```
